subject: Best practices for testing approximate equivalence?
msgSnippet: Does anybody have a good working approach to testing equality of real numbers.  For example, my expected result is precisely: 30 In actuality I get:

Does anybody have a good working approach to testing "equality" of real 
numbers.  For example, my expected result is precisely:

30

In actuality I get:

30.000000445292045

This is "close enough".  Of course I can test:

30 - marginOfError < result < 30 + marginOfError

but this clutters the code.  Any suggestions?
